introduction: How does the space we live in affect us, and what impact do we have on it?We explore with architects and specialists in various related fields how we perceive the urban environment and what effect this perception has on us. A cross-disciplinary approach to cities and living in new 'smart' cities. We build them, but are we really ready to live in them?源自：https://www.astrafilm.ro/en/2023/astra-film-new-media/film/urban-mindscape
